attributes.action: Close down schools but ensure we get proper education while learning remotely.
attributes.additional_details: We have seen COVID-19 cases both in teachers and students. School helps us build a foundation for our career but at this point of time, going to school could be hazardous for our lives entirely. Rules should be put into place indicating how we should ask for help, study and revise.
attributes.background: Close down schools but prioritise education while at home. Emphasise the importance of learning and ensure students are provided with all the resources they need to study and revise.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
